Namespace Hexalith.Infrastructure.MicrosoftSemanticKernel.Skills.ChatSkills

Classes

ChatSkill

ChatSkill offers a more coherent chat experience by using memories to extract conversation history and user intentions.

CopilotChatPlanner

A lightweight wrapper around a planner to allow for curating which skills are available to it.

DocumentMemorySkill

This skill provides the functions to query the document memory.

ExternalInformationSkill

This skill provides the functions to acquire external information.

SemanticChatMemory

A collection of semantic chat memory.

SemanticChatMemoryItem

A single entry in the chat memory.

SemanticChatMemorySkill

This skill provides the functions to query the semantic chat memory.
